model.user

Class UserDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.DAO
      • model.user.UserDAO

  • public class UserDAO
extends DAO
    The DAO class for the user table, that extends the DAO class.
    Author:
    Tiago DOS SANTOS, François KIM, Philippe PUONG, Axel SAINTILLAN
